    • Merge

      public void Merge​(java.lang.String mergiato) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException, java.io.IOException, java.security.GeneralSecurityException
      Merge Method called from testing.java that performs Merge Button in gui merging all selected files
      Parameters:
      mergiato - Merged's file name
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - Signals that an attempt to open the file denoted by a specified pathname has failed.
      java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception of some sort has occurred. This class is the general class of exceptions produced by failed or interrupted I/O operations.
      java.security.GeneralSecurityException - The GeneralSecurityException class is a generic security exception class that provides type safety for all the security-related exception classes that extend from it.
